name: as3delaunay
body:
# as3delaunay as3delaunay is an open-source ActionScript 3 library. In addition to the Voronoi diagram and the Delaunay triangulation, the library also provides the convex hull, minimum and maximum [spanning trees](http://nodename.com/blog/2009/05/12/the-name-of-the-node/), and several other related geometric entities. as3delaunay is based on Steven Fortune's [C implementation](http://as3delaunay.googlegroups.com/web/FortuneCSource.zip) of his [sweepline algorithm](http://as3delaunay.googlegroups.com/web/p313-fortune.pdf). This is release 1.0 of as3delaunay, September 28, 2009. ### Some Links * [Test Suite](http://github.com/nodename/as3delaunayTestRunner) * [haXe Port by Stephane Ledorze](https://bitbucket.org/sledorze/hxdelaunay) * [File a Bug](http://github.com/nodename/as3delaunay/issues) * [Meet the Community](http://groups.google.com/group/as3delaunay) ### as3delaunay in use * Commercial: [The Living Glass Conversation](http://glassislife.com/jointheconversation.aspx) * Game map generation: [Polygon Map Generation](http://simblob.blogspot.com/2010/09/polygon-map-generation-part-1.html) * Voronoi shattering : [Voronoi Shattering Complete!](http://jaketastic.com/blog/voronoi-shattering-complete/) * Data visualization: [Twitter Orographies](http://www.datainterfaces.org/2011/11/twitter-orographies/) * Generative art and animation:
    [Quick Sketch: Spanning Tree](http://rosskettle.net/blog/?p=77) [Faster Voronoi Noise](http://www.lidev.com.ar/faster-voronoi-noise/)
